Short Description (for website): Iconic Timurid ensemble of three madrasas in Samarkand's historic centre.
Complex of intricately tiled mausoleums and shrines.
Mausoleum of Timur with notable architecture and tomb.
Large historic mosque originally built for Timur's wife with grand portal.
Traditional bazaar providing local produce, breads and crafts.
Remains of famous medieval observatory with historical exhibits.
Museum of the ancient Afrasiyab settlement with archaeological finds.
Local mosque with historical ties; quiet courtyard.
Complex dedicated to Imam al-Bukhari with religious significance.
